alert.note: Alert for Addison (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:14PM EDT until July 13 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Essex County in northern New York... Southwestern Addison County in central Vermont... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 514 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pharoah Mountain, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Vergennes, Moriah, Crown Point, Westport, Cornwall, Weybridge, Salisbury, Schroon Lake, Whiting, New Haven, Port Henry, Addison, Shoreham, Ripton, Waltham, Panton, D A R State Park, Crown Point Center, and Bridport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
